title: Add real-world workflow examples
description: Add concrete scenarios showing swarm power: 1) Fix 100 TypeScript errors with multi-agent parallelism, 2) Multi-agent feature development with dependencies. Shows practical value immediately.

title: Add badges to README
description: Add professional badges: License, Agent Mail status, tool count, command count. Visual credibility and key metrics at a glance.

title: Add visual architecture diagram
description: Add ASCII/mermaid diagram showing AI assistants → coordination layer → Agent Mail/Beads/Tools. Helps visual learners understand system architecture.

title: Add Quick Start section to README
description: Add concise Quick Start section right after intro with 3-step installation. Shows users how to get started in 60 seconds. High impact for adoption.

title: Add troubleshooting section
description: Add common issues and solutions: Agent Mail not responding, FILE_RESERVATION_CONFLICT errors, tools not in PATH. Reduces support burden.

title: Add FAQ section to README
description: Answer common questions: How is this different from MCP? Compatible with which CLIs? Can I use without swarm mode?
